App_name: Which drink is a match for you?

Result.VODKA:
You’re a smart and charming
                        individual who knows
                        what they want and how they
                        want it. Once you've set a
                        goal, you’re determined to
                        achieve it.

Result.BEER:
You're a pretty easy—going
                            and happy—go—lucky person.
                            Though you don’t put more
                            effort than you have to,
                            things almost always work
                            out for you.

Result.GIN & TONIC:
You're the cool person of
                                  your group who always has
                                  an interesting story to tell. No
                                  matter where you are, you’re
                                  always having a good time
                                  and enjoying life.

Result.CHAMPAGNE:
You are an eloquent
                                  individual with a taste for
                                  the exquisite. For you,
                                  everyday should be a
                                  celebration of life in all its
                                  grandiosity.

Result.TEQUILA:
You’re daring and outgoing.
                              With your charm and wit, you
                              move through a crowded
                              room with ease, and you
                              leave a lasting impression on
                              those you meet.

Result.MARGARITA:
You’re outgoing and
                                straightforward. You can
                                strike up a conversation
                                with anyone and make
                                them laugh.

Result_share: You make an impact on people, and your influence extends beyond your expectations.
text_loder: You look like you could use a drink...
